name: Sieena
tag_list: sharepoint, -net, sql-server, silverlight, consulting, technology, innovation, wpf, wcf, moss, wss, rich-internet-applications, ria, collaboration-portals, mission-critical-system-support, support, 24x7
overview:
Serving businesses across North America, Sieena is dedicated to helping organizations achieve their most important business and technology goals. From custom SharePoint implementations that transform collaboration processes, to Rich Internet Applications and mission-critical systems support services, Sieena is passionate about infusing innovation and quality into everything it does.

Sieena was founded in 2004 with the goal of building the highest quality Microsoft-based technology practice. Today, the company has more than achieved that goal. As a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, Sieena has won numerous awards for its design work while also earning four Microsoft competencies. Headquartered in Los Angeles, Sieena maintains a state-of-the-art development facility in Monterrey, Mexico
